summary: A series of mysterious events and the pestering motor gang 'The Red Vampires' turns the idyllic holiday of Blinker and his friends into a thrilling adventure.
cast: Joren Seldeslachts|Melissa Gorduyn|Benny Claessens|Matthias Meersmans|Saskia Aelen|Warre Borgmans|Els Olaerts|Chris Lomme|Nathalie Meskens|Mieke Verheyden|Tim van Hoecke|Kristof Verhassel|Han Coucke|Luk D'Heu|Gerda Tilman|Jelle Cleymans|Eric Broeckx|Walter Van Roy|Edith Van De Schoor|Sjarel Branckaerts|Benjamin Van Tourhout|Senne Dehandschutter|Wouter Fimmers|Guy Bernaert|Daan Bauters|Evelyn De Blieck|Kobe Wouters|Sophie Van Blerk|Jo Hens|Isabelle Dumortier|Maarten De Cock|Anasthasia Dewitte|Filip De Ceuster|Jasper Callemeyn|Lisa Peleman|Marc de Bel|Bobby|Alain Van Goethem
title: Blinker
